'''Childe and Teucer's Mora Pouch''' is a quest item obtained from [[Tartaglia]]'s [[Story Quest]] Act I - [[Mighty Cyclops' Adventure!]], ''[[Across the Sea]]''. It starts out with 35,000 [[Mora]].

Similar to the [[Archon Quest]] ''[[Downtown]]'', you can barter with [[Granny Shan]] and [[Chef Mao]] to lower the amount of Mora spent to entertain [[Teucer]].

After completing the quest, any leftover Mora can be exchanged at the [[Northland Bank]] by talking to [[Ekaterina]].
